00033 /* Some ICMP messages should be passed to the transport protocols. This
00034    is not implemented. */
00035 
00036 #include "lwip/opt.h"
00037 
00038 #include "lwip/icmp.h"
00039 #include "lwip/inet.h"
00040 #include "lwip/ip.h"
00041 #include "lwip/def.h"
00042 
00043 #include "lwip/stats.h"
00044 
00045 #include "lwip/snmp.h"
00046 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 void
00048 icmp_input(struct pbuf *p, struct netif *inp)
00049 {
00050   unsigned char type;
00051   unsigned char code;
00052   struct icmp_echo_hdr *iecho;
00053   struct ip_hdr *iphdr;
00054   struct ip_addr tmpaddr;
00055   u16_t hlen;
00056 
00057 #ifdef ICMP_STATS
00058   ++lwip_stats.icmp.recv;
00059 #endif /* ICMP_STATS */
00060   snmp_inc_icmpinmsgs();
00061 
00062 
00063   iphdr = p->payload;
00064   hlen = IPH_HL(iphdr) * 4;
00065   if (pbuf_header(p, -((s16_t)hlen)) || (p->tot_len < sizeof(u16_t)*2)) {
00066     LWIP_DEBUGF(ICMP_DEBUG, ("icmp_input: short ICMP (%u bytes) received\n", p->tot_len));
00067     pbuf_free(p);
00068 #ifdef ICMP_STATS
00069     ++lwip_stats.icmp.lenerr;
00070 #endif /* ICMP_STATS */
00071     snmp_inc_icmpinerrors();
00072     return;
00073   }
00074 
00075   type = *((u8_t *)p->payload);
00076   code = *(((u8_t *)p->payload)+1);
00077   switch (type) {
00078   case ICMP_ECHO:
00079     if (ip_addr_isbroadcast(&iphdr->dest, &inp->netmask) ||
00080        ip_addr_ismulticast(&iphdr->dest)) {
00081       LWIP_DEBUGF(ICMP_DEBUG, ("Smurf.\n"));
00082 #ifdef ICMP_STATS
00083       ++lwip_stats.icmp.err;
00084 #endif /* ICMP_STATS */
00085       pbuf_free(p);
00086       return;
00087     }
00088     LWIP_DEBUGF(ICMP_DEBUG, ("icmp_input: ping\n"));
00089     LWIP_DEBUGF(DEMO_DEBUG, ("Pong!\n"));
00090     if (p->tot_len < sizeof(struct icmp_echo_hdr)) {
00091       LWIP_DEBUGF(ICMP_DEBUG, ("icmp_input: bad ICMP echo received\n"));
00092       pbuf_free(p);
00093 #ifdef ICMP_STATS
00094       ++lwip_stats.icmp.lenerr;
00095 #endif /* ICMP_STATS */
00096       snmp_inc_icmpinerrors();
00097 
00098       return;
00099     }
00100     iecho = p->payload;
00101     if (inet_chksum_pbuf(p) != 0) {
00102       LWIP_DEBUGF(ICMP_DEBUG, ("icmp_input: checksum failed for received ICMP echo\n"));
00103       pbuf_free(p);
00104 #ifdef ICMP_STATS
00105       ++lwip_stats.icmp.chkerr;
00106 #endif /* ICMP_STATS */
00107       snmp_inc_icmpinerrors();
00108       return;
00109     }
00110     tmpaddr.addr = iphdr->src.addr;
00111     iphdr->src.addr = iphdr->dest.addr;
00112     iphdr->dest.addr = tmpaddr.addr;
00113     ICMPH_TYPE_SET(iecho, ICMP_ER);
00114     /* adjust the checksum */
00115     if (iecho->chksum >= htons(0xffff - (ICMP_ECHO << 8))) {
00116       iecho->chksum += htons(ICMP_ECHO << 8) + 1;
00117     } else {
00118       iecho->chksum += htons(ICMP_ECHO << 8);
00119     }
00120 #ifdef ICMP_STATS
00121     ++lwip_stats.icmp.xmit;
00122 #endif /* ICMP_STATS */
00123     /* increase number of messages attempted to send */
00124     snmp_inc_icmpoutmsgs();
00125     /* increase number of echo replies attempted to send */
00126     snmp_inc_icmpoutechoreps();
00127 
00128     pbuf_header(p, hlen);
00129     ip_output_if (p, &(iphdr->src), IP_HDRINCL,
00130      IPH_TTL(iphdr), IP_PROTO_ICMP, inp);
00131     break;
00132   default:
00133   LWIP_DEBUGF(ICMP_DEBUG, ("icmp_input: ICMP type %d code %d not supported.\n", (int)type, (int)code));
00134 #ifdef ICMP_STATS
00135     ++lwip_stats.icmp.proterr;
00136     ++lwip_stats.icmp.drop;
00137 #endif /* ICMP_STATS */
00138   }
00139   pbuf_free(p);
00140 }
00141 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00142 void
00143 icmp_dest_unreach(struct pbuf *p, enum icmp_dur_type t)
00144 {
00145   struct pbuf *q;
00146   struct ip_hdr *iphdr;
00147   struct icmp_dur_hdr *idur;
00148 
00149   q = pbuf_alloc(PBUF_IP, 8 + IP_HLEN + 8, PBUF_RAM);
00150   /* ICMP header + IP header + 8 bytes of data */
00151 
00152   iphdr = p->payload;
00153 
00154   idur = q->payload;
00155   ICMPH_TYPE_SET(idur, ICMP_DUR);
00156   ICMPH_CODE_SET(idur, t);
00157 
00158   memcpy((char *)q->payload + 8, p->payload, IP_HLEN + 8);
00159 
00160   /* calculate checksum */
00161   idur->chksum = 0;
00162   idur->chksum = inet_chksum(idur, q->len);
00163 #ifdef ICMP_STATS
00164   ++lwip_stats.icmp.xmit;
00165 #endif /* ICMP_STATS */
00166   /* increase number of messages attempted to send */
00167   snmp_inc_icmpoutmsgs();
00168   /* increase number of destination unreachable messages attempted to send */
00169   snmp_inc_icmpoutdestunreachs();
00170 
00171   ip_output(q, NULL, &(iphdr->src),
00172       ICMP_TTL, IP_PROTO_ICMP);
00173   pbuf_free(q);
00174 }
00175 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00176 #if IP_FORWARD
00177 void
00178 icmp_time_exceeded(struct pbuf *p, enum icmp_te_type t)
00179 {
00180   struct pbuf *q;
00181   struct ip_hdr *iphdr;
00182   struct icmp_te_hdr *tehdr;
00183 
00184   q = pbuf_alloc(PBUF_IP, 8 + IP_HLEN + 8, PBUF_RAM);
00185 
00186   iphdr = p->payload;
00187 #if ICMP_DEBUG
00188   LWIP_DEBUGF(ICMP_DEBUG, ("icmp_time_exceeded from "));
00189   ip_addr_debug_print(ICMP_DEBUG, &(iphdr->src));
00190   LWIP_DEBUGF(ICMP_DEBUG, (" to "));
00191   ip_addr_debug_print(ICMP_DEBUG, &(iphdr->dest));
00192   LWIP_DEBUGF(ICMP_DEBUG, ("\n"));
00193 #endif /* ICMP_DEBNUG */
00194 
00195   tehdr = q->payload;
00196   ICMPH_TYPE_SET(tehdr, ICMP_TE);
00197   ICMPH_CODE_SET(tehdr, t);
00198 
00199   /* copy fields from original packet */
00200   memcpy((char *)q->payload + 8, (char *)p->payload, IP_HLEN + 8);
00201 
00202   /* calculate checksum */
00203   tehdr->chksum = 0;
00204   tehdr->chksum = inet_chksum(tehdr, q->len);
00205 #ifdef ICMP_STATS
00206   ++lwip_stats.icmp.xmit;
00207 #endif /* ICMP_STATS */
00208   /* increase number of messages attempted to send */
00209   snmp_inc_icmpoutmsgs();
00210   /* increase number of destination unreachable messages attempted to send */
00211   snmp_inc_icmpouttimeexcds();
00212   ip_output(q, NULL, &(iphdr->src),
00213       ICMP_TTL, IP_PROTO_ICMP);
00214   pbuf_free(q);
00215 }
00216 
00217 #endif /* IP_FORWARDING > 0 */
